trans-unit.source: The ServiceNameElement class represents a configuration element for a service name used in a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A szolgáltatás neve szerepel jelenti a ServiceNameElement osztály egy konfigurációs elem egy <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Ez a konstruktor új példányának inicializálása használatakor a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement>osztály, a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A>tulajdonsága `null`.</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property should be set to an appropriate value for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> instance to the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A>tulajdonsághoz az alkalmazásokat, mielőtt a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A>adható hozzá a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement>példányt kell az <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>osztály</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> </xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> megfelelő értéket kell megadni</xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) for this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi vagy beállítja a Service Provider egyszerű szolgáltatásnév (SPN) a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"> </xref> példány.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the representation of SPN for this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>, amely tartalmazza ezt az SPN ábrázolását <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"> </xref> példány.</xref:System.String>
